skills.name: Justice Strike
skills.description: Attacks and stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 15% chance. You'll gain immunity for 1 turn afterwards. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%
skills.multiplier_formula: 1.3*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.18*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Prayer of Protection
skills.description: Removes all harmful effects on the ally and makes the ally invincible for 1 turn.

skills.name: Cry of Threat
skills.description: Creates a shield that's proportionate to your HP for 2 turns on yourself and activates Threat state while the enemy attacks 3 times. The enemy can only attack the target under the Threat state when using the attack skill.
skills.level_progress_description:
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1
skills.multiplier_formula: 0.2*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
